strings.Value: {n}The mirror comes alive under your touch. Its dark surface is lit by flashes of a battle that happened in this very room, an unknown age ago. A group of warriors in dark clothes are fighting a flock of gargoyles. There are clouds of sorcerous mist in the hallway behind their backs. Suddenly, it's pierced by a ray of light, and the familiar wizard appears on the battlefield, holding a magic lantern in his hand. He is swaying from pain, but looks angry and resolute.{/n}

"We will all die here! Run!" {n}One of the soldiers screams. Without hesitation, the wizard pushes him right into the gargoyles' claws. As soon as the monsters are distracted with their victim, the wizard envelops the entire group in a spell, and kills them on the spot.{/n} "Get to the stairs! To the second floor!" {n}He lights the lantern, and the warriors swiftly retreat into the mist.{/n}

{n}The vision fades. But then another room, and another wizard's reflection appears on the other side of the glass â€” the one you first spoke to. It nods to you and says quietly,{/n} "I remember... remember this fight... you are on the right path."
